alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 04 at 11:01AM MST until January 05 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Winds have fallen below High Wind thresholds for today, therefore the Warning has been cancelled. For late tonight through Wednesday, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph are possible. * WHERE...East Sweetwater County, South Lincoln County, Rock Springs and Green River and Flaming Gorge. This includes portions of I-80 in southern Wyoming. * WHEN...High Wind Watch in effect from late tonight through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County
